3NyNPJaemMYsL14DK2tO01.name: Cheryl
3NyNPJaemMYsL14DK2tO01.fact: Did you know that Cheryl was born and raised in Newcastle? She grow up on council estates in the suburbs of Walker and Heaton. She came to fame within Girls Aloud before moving onto a solo career.

12EtLdLfJ41vUOoVzPZIUy.name: Girls Aloud
12EtLdLfJ41vUOoVzPZIUy.fact: When they were active, one of their five members was Cheryl. Did you know that she's a Geordie? Post Girls Aloud she's gone onto have a successful solo career.

5epNPX8lcU2simDUaCfgeB.name: Owen Brannigan
5epNPX8lcU2simDUaCfgeB.fact: Did you know that Owen is a Geordie? He was born in Annitsford, a little village in North Tyneside.

2s96tw2STQo5HTXiiGdcpC.name: David Clelland
2s96tw2STQo5HTXiiGdcpC.fact: Did you know that David is a Geordie? He was born in Gateshead. Singing wasn't his main job, that was being an MP for the Tyne Bridge parliamentary constituency from 1985 until it was abolished in 2010.

5RNFFojXkPRmlJZIwXeKQC.name: Bryan Ferry
5RNFFojXkPRmlJZIwXeKQC.fact: Did you know that Bryan is from the North East? He was born and raised in Washington, and studied fine art at Newcastle University in the 60s.

3fhOTtm0LBJ3Ojn4hIljLo.name: Roxy Music
3fhOTtm0LBJ3Ojn4hIljLo.fact: Did you know that Bryan Ferry formed this group in 1970? He's from the North East, having been born and raised in Washington.

1n65zfwYIj5kKEtNgxUlWb.name: Siouxsie and the Banshees
1n65zfwYIj5kKEtNgxUlWb.fact: Did you know that a former member of this group was Bryan Ferry? He's from the North East, having been born and raised in Washington. He studied fine art at Newcastle University in the 60s, which is when he was in the band.

6BmmCdfxkGvxx1RkDNXpIX.name: Graeme Danby
6BmmCdfxkGvxx1RkDNXpIX.fact: Did you know that Graeme is from the North East? He was born in Consett, a town about 14 miles south-west of Newcastle.

6xq4VamyyoknqqAg44ZzlK.name: Alex Glasgow
6xq4VamyyoknqqAg44ZzlK.fact: Did you know that Alex is a Geordie? He was from Gateshead. He became widely known for his own style of Geordie songs, often on polictical topics, generally socialist and/or trades union-focused.

345IUEgYmPBU0JAHuRRGyA.name: Robson & Jerome
345IUEgYmPBU0JAHuRRGyA.fact: Did you know that Robson, from this duo, is a Geordie? He was raised in Dudley, a villlage in North Tyneside. As a bonus fact: the other half of this duo, Jerome, protrayed Bronn in Game of Thrones!

4Ii2nZkY4Metxf4YDwBlaF.name: Jed Grimes
4Ii2nZkY4Metxf4YDwBlaF.fact: Did you know that Jed is a North Easte musician? He played in a folk-rock band called Hedgehog Pie in the 1970s.

27jDmuF9yB0lXhwaNyMaCs.name: Johnny Handle
27jDmuF9yB0lXhwaNyMaCs.fact: Did you know that Johnny is a Geordie? He was born and raised in Wallsend.

2BIw82ChQI4XFqjygoNXhQ.name: The High Level Ranters
2BIw82ChQI4XFqjygoNXhQ.fact: Did you know that Newcastle is this bands hometown? Jim was born in Gateshead, Johnny in Wallsend and Colin in North Shields; this makes them all Geordies!

0TJOVQKoS7sbGVn8RkkvPI.name: Brian Johnson
0TJOVQKoS7sbGVn8RkkvPI.fact: Did you know that Brian is a Geordie? He was born and raised in Dunston, a village on the south bank of the River Tyne.

0IzJYdxaNLwrC7diSCu0iY.name: Geordie
0IzJYdxaNLwrC7diSCu0iY.fact: The name says it all really - this band was definitely from Newcastle. Did you know though that their most famous member is Brian Johnson, who went onto become the lead singer in AC/DC?

711MCceyCBcFnzjGY4Q7Un.name: AC/DC
711MCceyCBcFnzjGY4Q7Un.fact: Following the death of Bon Scott, Brian Johnson became the lead singer of AC/DC. What you may not know is that he's a Geordie, having been born and raised in Dunston, a village on south bank of the River Tyne.

5qEEbES7lWt59woamgURp5.name: Lou Killen
5qEEbES7lWt59woamgURp5.fact: Did you know that Lou is a Geordie? They're from Gateshead and formed one of Britian's first folk clubs in 1958 in Newcastle.

4qWTqOdDnH56Qak9UjmpKz.name: The Clancy Brothers
4qWTqOdDnH56Qak9UjmpKz.fact: Did you know that, despite being an Irish band, one of their past members, Lou, was a Geordie? They're from Gateshead and formed one of Britian's first folk clubs in 1958 in Newcastle.

0FI0kxP0BWurTz8cB8BBug.name: Mark Knopfler
0FI0kxP0BWurTz8cB8BBug.fact: Despite being born in Glasgow, Mark was raised in Newcastle. At the start of his career, he co-founded the rock band Dire Straits. Since then he's gone on to have a solo career.

22wbIvCMDEThS8KIjE1b4K.name: David Knopfler
22wbIvCMDEThS8KIjE1b4K.fact: Despite being born in Glasgow, David was raised in Newcastle. He's the younger brother of Mark Knopfler, with whom he founded rock band Dire Straits.

0WwSkZ7LtFUFjGjMZBMt6T.name: Dire Straits
0WwSkZ7LtFUFjGjMZBMt6T.fact: Two of the founding members of the Dire Straits were Mark & David Knopfler. Whilst they were both born in Glasgow, they were raised in Newcastle.

4AgFg0hHythyklEs4t7XKt.name: Lindisfarne
4AgFg0hHythyklEs4t7XKt.fact: Did you know that this bands name came from the small island of the same name that's off the coast of Northumberland?

5JmiJ0uN4rutaRsDfBUPHl.name: Jimmy Nail
5JmiJ0uN4rutaRsDfBUPHl.fact: Did you know that Jimmy is a Geordie? He was born in Newcastle in 1954 as James Michael Aloysius Bradford.

3WKTiixhkaWRexRUs3GKBw.name: Alan Price
3WKTiixhkaWRexRUs3GKBw.fact: Did you know that Alan is a Geordie? He was born and raised in Washington and educated at Jarrow Grammar School. He was a founding member of the the Tyneside group "The Alan Price Rhythm and Blues Combo", which later transitioned in The Animals.

3ICflSq6ZgYAIrm2CTkfVP.name: The Animals
3ICflSq6ZgYAIrm2CTkfVP.fact: Did you know that The Animals is a Newcastle based band? It was formed when five Geordies came together and "The Alan Price Rhythm and Blues Combo" transitioned into The Animals.

3miNucraVWk4hdVsIxn7id.name: Eric Burdon
3miNucraVWk4hdVsIxn7id.fact: Did you know that Eric is a Geordie? He was born in the Walker area of Newcastle. In his earlier career he was a vocalist of rock band The Animals, and subsequently the funk band War. Since then he's had a solo career.

3ICyfoySNDZqtBVmaBT84I.name: War
3ICyfoySNDZqtBVmaBT84I.fact: Did you know that War was originally called Eric Burdon and War, and that Eric was a Geordie? Eric was born in the Walker area of Newcastle, and also performed with The Animals.

0Ty63ceoRnnJKVEYP0VQpk.name: Sting
0Ty63ceoRnnJKVEYP0VQpk.fact: Did you know that Sting is a Geordie? He was born and raised in the Wallsend area of Newcastle. He's had a successful career with The Police, and even performed at The Queen's Birthday Party in 2018.

5NGO30tJxFlKixkPSgXcFE.name: The Police
5NGO30tJxFlKixkPSgXcFE.fact: Did you know that their lead vocalist, Sting, is a Geordie? He was born and raised in the Wallsend area of Newcastle.

1luY92PbdGWRyBRY1ZR7o1.name: The Unthanks
1luY92PbdGWRyBRY1ZR7o1.fact: Did you know that the Unthank sisters are Geordies? They were raised in the village of Ryton, on the south bank of the River Tyne.

6bz0ztmnpeofmoFksV3DqL.name: The Wildhearts
6bz0ztmnpeofmoFksV3DqL.fact: Did you know that The Wildhearts are a Newcastle based band? Their leader, Ginger, was born and raised in South Shields.

0d49iRrp4iVZggKbcpxnqI.name: The Quireboys
0d49iRrp4iVZggKbcpxnqI.fact: Did you know that The Quireboys has strong ties to Newcastle? Their frontman, Spike, is a Geordie, having been born in Newcastle.

1DtvquLh9kUOQHnOwuiHdv.name: Alan Hull
1DtvquLh9kUOQHnOwuiHdv.fact: Did you know that Alan was a Geordie? He was born and raised in the Benwell suburb of Newcastle. He was a founding member of the Tyneside folk rock band Lindisfarne.

2ycnb8Er79LoH2AsR5ldjh.name: Pet Shop Boys
2ycnb8Er79LoH2AsR5ldjh.fact: Did you know that Neil is a Geordie? He was born and raised in North Shields!

2PPMU9qWa1nt4O6g4wtZj8.name: Andy Taylor
2PPMU9qWa1nt4O6g4wtZj8.fact: Did you know that Andy is a Geordie? He was born and raised in Cullercoats!

0lZoBs4Pzo7R89JM9lxwoT.name: Duran Duran
0lZoBs4Pzo7R89JM9lxwoT.fact: Did you know that former member Andy Taylor is a Geordie?

5z96yaS2s1USscDldCCDgw.name: Angelic Upstarts
5z96yaS2s1USscDldCCDgw.fact: Did you know that Angelic Upstarts are from South Shields? That means they're a Geordie band!

2gmeFH5Iz8UEA7K0OHDePQ.name: Ant & Dec
2gmeFH5Iz8UEA7K0OHDePQ.fact: Did you know that Ant & Dec are both Geordies? They're also better known as a presenting duo on TV.

03hfAxVdAWj7kxDnSG0fLD.name: The Shadows
03hfAxVdAWj7kxDnSG0fLD.fact: Did you know that Bruce, The Shadow's rhythm guitarist, is a Geordie? Despite being born in the south, he grew up in Chester-le-Street.

4IdvJZeciaa37wYr2qBpjm.name: Cliff Richard and The Shadows
4IdvJZeciaa37wYr2qBpjm.fact: Did you know that Bruce, The Shadow's rhythm guitarist, is a Geordie? Despite being born in the south, he grew up in Chester-le-Street.

6FKokxvL5PCWIxrVhMyDgI.name: Demob Happy
6FKokxvL5PCWIxrVhMyDgI.fact: Did you know that Demob Happy was originally a Geordie band?

3SRTWBeGhX3o5DCQ2zzTdI.name: Dubstar
3SRTWBeGhX3o5DCQ2zzTdI.fact: Did you know that Dubstar is a band with Geordie origins? They formed in the Jesmond suburb of Newcastle.

3Bet1o6dTKJG8o4HcrbI37.name: Hank Marvin
3Bet1o6dTKJG8o4HcrbI37.fact: Did you know that Hank is a Geordie? He is best known for being the lead guitarist of The Shadows.

3e7awlrlDSwF3iM0WBjGMp.name: Little Mix
3e7awlrlDSwF3iM0WBjGMp.fact: Did you know that Jade is a Geordie? She was raised in the Laygate neighbourhood of South Shields.

38SqjWcm8au0qiQZvd3FbF.name: Joe McElderry
38SqjWcm8au0qiQZvd3FbF.fact: Did you know that Joe is a Geordie? He was born in South Shields and raised in Tyneside.

7sx3r4lMo079vO7lIi0fng.name: Lanterns on the Lake
7sx3r4lMo079vO7lIi0fng.fact: Did you know that Lanterns on the Lake is a Geordie band?

6edGSAX5dVpeJVwu1Q0NwJ.name: The Lighthouse Family
6edGSAX5dVpeJVwu1Q0NwJ.fact: Did you know that this duo came together in Newcastle? Tunde and Paul meet when studying at the university and also working at the same bar.

3mIj9lX2MWuHmhNCA7LSCW.name: The 1975
3mIj9lX2MWuHmhNCA7LSCW.fact: Did you know that lead vocalists / rhythm guitarist, Matthew, is a Geordie? Although not born in the North East, he was raised in Prudhoe, a town about 11 miles west of Newcastle.

048FBwXjFYBWxSggPDipic.name: Maxïmo Park
048FBwXjFYBWxSggPDipic.fact: Did you know that this band has its origins in Newcastle?

75OpU10VolujEA1pl0h1dX.name: Nadine Shah
75OpU10VolujEA1pl0h1dX.fact: Did you know that Nadine is a Geordie? She was born in Whitburn, a village in South Tyneside.

0VeQgI9lzgoOMszAOq0iml.name: Richard Dawson
0VeQgI9lzgoOMszAOq0iml.fact: Did you know that Richard is a Geordie? He was born and raised in Newcastle.

6zlR5ttMfMNmwf2lecU9Cc.name: Sam Fender
6zlR5ttMfMNmwf2lecU9Cc.fact: Did you know that Sam is a Geordie? He was born and raised in North Shields.

1MZ8NERIuOS610KBhr6yna.name: Tygers of Pan Tang
1MZ8NERIuOS610KBhr6yna.fact: Did you know that this is a Geordie band? They are based in Whitley Bay.

5fwaejlOHVBAw1KhIPPaQe.name: Venom
5fwaejlOHVBAw1KhIPPaQe.fact: Did you know that this is a Geordie band? The band formed in Newcastle in 1978.
